data.text: “Muxun naxan waxi a xa a nɔ,
Muxu yo mi susɛ yɛngɛn bagɛ a ma,
Nde a doli n ma,
“N mɔn xa falan ti ige yi sube ɲaxin salen seene ma,
Nde nɔɛ a kidin bɛ a ma?
Nde nɔɛ a gbɛgbɛni biyɛ?
A xali xɔdɛxɛne safa wuyaxi nan a fari,
E saxi e bode fari,
E tugunxi e bode ra,
“Ige yi sube ɲaxin na tison,
Tɛɛ dɛgɛn minima a dɛ,
A ɲɔɛ tutin tema,
A ɲɔɛ foyen tigine radɛgɛma,
Sɛnbɛna a kɔɛɛn nin,
A fati kidin ɲixiriɲixirine wuya,
A bɔɲɛn xɔdɔxɔ alo gɛmɛna,
“A na keli, alane yi gaxu,
Silanfanna mi sese ligama a ra,
Wuren luxi nɛn a tan xa
A mi a gima xalimakunla yɛɛ ra,
Gbelemɛn luxi nɛn a tan xa
A kui kidin luxi nɛn
“A na sin fɔxɔ igen tilinna ma,
A funfuni yalanxin nan luma a xanbi ra igeni,
A kanna mi muxu yo ra bɔxɔ xɔnna fari.
A yaxu sɛnbɛma yo na keli,
